entities.name: rita
entities.description: Rita is described as having unkempt hair and chipped nail polish. She is also mentioned to be writing horrible stories about Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned in the context of Rita's stories and Hermione's irritation with her.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as being irritated with Rita's behavior and mentions a deal that has not been discussed yet.

relationships.description: Rita writes horrible stories about Harry.
